item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #482】SRE周刊＃482
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, PagerDuty: Incidents move fast. But you’ll never get left behind with PagerDuty’s GenAI incident response assistant, available in all paid plans. Get instant business impact analysis, troubleshooting steps, and auto-drafted status updates—directly in Slack. Stop context-switching, start resolving faster. https://fnf.dev/4dZ5V36 Service Disruption on multiple Salesforce services on […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Pagerduty的消息：事件快速移动。但是，您永远不会被Pagerduty的Genai事件响应助理留下来，这些响应助理在所有付费计划中都可以使用。立即进行业务影响分析，故障排除步骤和自动放牧状态更新，直接在Slack中。停止上下文切换，开始更快地解决。 https://fnf.dev/4dz5v36在[…]上多个Salesforce服务上的服务中断

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #483】SRE周刊＃483
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, PagerDuty: When the internet faltered on June 12th, other incident management platforms may have crashed—but PagerDuty handled a 172% surge in incidents and 433% spike in notifications flawlessly. Your platform should be rock-solid during a storm, not another worry. See what sets PagerDuty’s reliability apart. The same […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Pagerduty的一条消息：当互联网在6月12日步履蹒跚时，其他事件管理平台可能已经崩溃了，但Pagerduty处理了172％的事件激增，通知无处不在433％。您的平台应该在暴风雨中是岩石的，而不是另一个担心。看看是什么设定了Pagerduty的可靠性。相同 […]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #481】SRE周刊＃481
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, PagerDuty: Need Slack-native E2E incident management? PagerDuty delivers! Automatic incident workflows that set up Slack channels? ✅ Incident roles and built-in commands? ✅ AI-powered chat that provides real-time customer impact? ✅ Now available on ALL paid PagerDuty plans. https://fnf.dev/4dZ5V36 Google Cloud Platform Incident, June 12, 2025 On […]】在sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Pagerduty的消息：需要Slack-Native E2E事件管理吗？ Pagerduty提供！自动事件工作流程设置了松弛频道？ ✅事件角色和内置命令？ ✅提供实时客户影响的AI驱动聊天？ ✅现在所有付费的Pagerduty计划可用。 https://fnf.dev/4dz5v36 Google Cloud Platform事件，2025年6月12日在[…]上

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #479】SRE周刊＃479
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com Automatic rollbacks are a last resort Rollbacks don’t always return you to a previous system state. They can return you to a state you’ve never tested or operated before.   Steve Fenton — Octopus Deploy Burn rate is a better error rate This article explains the math of burn rate alerting and gives […]】在sweekly.com上查看自动回滚是最后的度假胜地回滚，并不总是将您返回到以前的系统状态。他们可以将您返回您以前从未进行过测试或操作的状态。 史蒂夫·芬顿（Steve Fenton） - 章鱼部署燃烧率是一个更好的错误率，本文解释了烧伤率警报的数学，并给出了[…]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #480】SRE周刊＃480
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, PagerDuty: 🔍 Notable PagerDuty shift: Full incident management now spans all paid tiers.
